mapper.update:
update member
UserName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PhoneNo = #{phoneno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMail = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LoginPwd = #{loginpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ProvinceCode = #{provincecode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CityCode = #{citycode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AreaCode = #{areacode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Sex = #{sex,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IsLock = #{islock,jdbcType=BIT},
TrueName = #{truename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IdCard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Level = #{level,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
HeadImage = #{headimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update member set UserName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PhoneNo = #{phoneno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMail = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LoginPwd = #{loginpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProvinceCode = #{provincecode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CityCode = #{citycode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AreaCode = #{areacode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Sex = #{sex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsLock = #{islock,jdbcType=BIT}, TrueName = #{truename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IdCard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Level = #{level,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, HeadImage = #{headimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.sql:
1=1
and m.id=${applyId}
and m.UserName>=''${memberName}''
and m.email>=''${mail}''
and m.Level=${memberType}
and m.createTime>=''${registerStartDate}''
and ''${registerEndDate}''>m.createTime
